original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3261)@</color>快速的上下掃舞動武器，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3261)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成兩次物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3261)@</color> Quickly sweep up and down to move the weapon, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3261) @</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes two physical damage to the enemy.
